definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sentences.chinese: 海湾战争使伊拉克大伤元气。

sentences.english: Congress is to raise questions about the administration's handling of the post-Gulf War situation.
sentences.chinese: 国会将就政府对海湾战争后局势的处理提出问题。

sentences.english: The Gulf War has cost Iraq dearly.; Iraq has been drained of its strength by the Gulf War.; The Gulf War has sapped Iraqi vitality badly.
sentences.chinese: 海湾战争使伊拉克大伤元气。

sentences.english: The vehicle earned its reputation during the Gulf War.
sentences.chinese: 由于在海湾战争中表现优异，悍马车型声名鹊起。

sentences.english: Congress is to raise questions about the administration's handling of the post-gulf war situation.
sentences.chinese: 国会对于政府处理驻海湾战争的形势提出了问题。

sentences.english: This recession was   I think   just a Gulf War recession.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这个经济衰退只是，海湾战争经济衰退。

sentences.english: I saw this six months before the Gulf war started.
sentences.chinese: 我是在海湾战争爆发前六个月看到这一景象的。
